additional_notes: The document is a Criminal Notice of Appeal - Form A, filed on 7/7/2022. It contains handwritten and printed text, as well as stamps. The document is related to the case of Ghislaine Maxwell, who is appealing a judgment entered on 6/29/2022. The appeal concerns the conviction and sentence. The defendant was found guilty by trial. The document includes information about the defendant's counsel, Bobbi C. Sternheim, and the Assistant U.S. Attorney, Maurene Comey.
